titleInfo.title: Letter, J.G.M. Ramsey in Charleston, S.C., to M.B.C. Ramsey in Mecklenburg, Tenn. 1828 Dec. 15

mods.abstract: 1828 Dec. 15, J.G.M. Ramsey, Charleston, S.C., to his wife, Margaret B.C. Ramsey, Mecklenburg, near Knoxville, Tenn. Expresses his homesickness and describes his lodgings and churches he has attended. Relates that his professor at the Medical College is a distant relative who has made his stay in Charleston more pleasant. Describes his proposed return route home via Savannah, Augusta, and Ashville. Mentions the current fashions for ladies in Charleston and requests instructions about what he is to buy for her. Affectionate mention of their children, including the deceased daughter, Margaret Jane.
